titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 60th anniversary of the Peace Corps and commending the volunteers who have dedicated their lives to making a difference in the world.
A resolution recognizing the 60th anniversary of the Peace Corps and commending the volunteers who have dedicated their lives to making a difference in the world.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 60th anniversary of the Peace Corps and commends Peace Corps volunteers and staff.
